Review: toilet bowl is stained, the interior is poorly maintained, carpet is like 30 years old. staff are helpful and kind though. this is a 5 star hotel they need massive renovation.
in general, hotel needs major improvement.

Hotel room is crying for renovation, carpets are stained, only few lights work on central control panel, bathroom lacks ventilation, room was very cold despite Aircon being turned off for 3 days - I guess gets cooled from the adjacent rooms. Buffet breakfast included in the price of the room was good - just make sure you are down for breakfast before 8:30am - after that items don't get re-supplied and those not popular items sitting since 6:00am are just cold. Staff friendly and very proud of their City and the property - Thumbs up !!!
a very pleasant stay ! staff was very friendly and helpful . a very upscale hotel with a good view from the floor to ceiling windows / and the cr was like new
The room description that I booked was not the accomodation were given to us. Even I insist the room details that was described by your end. Anyway I still recomend this hotel for value for money
If you are touring for local shopping, then thjis is right beside the SM LANANG MALL

✔The location is good it's near shopping malls and restaurants. ❌Buffet breakfast is okay but my only problem with this is that they do not refill the food immediately, the spoon and fork, the glass, bread, salad, juice and water. I was pissed off that time because they knew that they have many guests that day but they do not refill the food immediately it's okay if they have plenty of food to choose from but they only have few. ✔ Should I recommend this hotel? Yes.

The room was to old ang dirty or undity! The wifi in room was to poor signal and the lobby reception nice especially the gentlemen i forgot the name he was the one who brought my baggage from room to a cab The building its need seruios renovation
It's a big hotel but luck of maintenance . . Need renovation and add more staff to clean the rooms because it's not a easy job. Thank you. Sorry
Good food, value for money and accomodating staff.

The guards, the concierge, bellows and everyone else EXCEPT the front desk staff were very courteous and friendly. When I arrived at the front desk, the lady staff did not even say a quick good morning or smile in acknowledgement, just continued with what she was doing with another client. After close to 10 minutes of waiting, that is when I asked "miss, is there no one else who can assist me, I have an early meeting". That is when she acknowledged me and proceeded with my check-in process. The supervisor also seems to be in an unhappy mood that morning. Oh well, everything else was OK.
Once upon a time was good but no more, aircon hot and people slow this day
Good spot and good location with lots of parking. Great staff and service. Grand old hotel. Don't change a thing.
Nice location, but very limited facilities despite the spaciousness of the grounds. Disturbed (early) in the morning by staff cleaning outside. That's unacceptable. Don't think I would use it again
The staff are accommodating and attentive to our queries.

The Grand regal is not quite an old hotel and you you can see it everywhere. It really needs a make-over. It´s really old fashioned. The rooms are spacious, the bed is hug and the view from the 10th floor is awesome- The room are equiped with a big bed, normal sized cr, tv, fridge and a desk. And an old carpet. You get all you need, but it´s not like a 4 star hotel. ZThe breakfast is ok. The best is really the staff which is very helpful. The hotel is located close to SM Lanang and close tht airport. So that´s a big pro for the Grand regal.
Poor wifi No light in bathroom No bathroom floor mat Lots of mosquito Bed not made nicely

The service provided by this hotel is excellent! The location is also good. It's easy to get a cab and near premier malls. The value for money is also excellent. It's cheap at 3K per night, considering the size of the room and amenities. What we do not like is the buffet breakfast. We ate breakfast at 9am (they serve until 10am) and there are few food left. They do not refill outright. The taste is also average.

You have to pay cash for room service orders! The front desk simpletons would not just ask for a credit card which we have plenty of as they do in all hotels we have been to be assured of the financial ability of the guest. Here in this hotel if you paid through Agoda they treat as an idiot who thinks everything every food you eat or order is included in the Agoda bill. Idiots!
Location was near sm lanang premier mall. Accessible and afordable. Breakfast was also good.
I would recommend my friends. Thanks!

After trying many hotels in Davao City I would say that the Grand Regal Hotel is the best hotel for me. Never mine Abreeza or Radisson they are in another class of hotels. But for the P 2,000 - P 4,000.00 range I would say that this hotel is value for money due to its large rooms, fairly good breakfast, location (in the middle of the busy JP Laurel Avenue), close to good restaurants and SM Lanang Mall. Would help if you renovate the pool, arrange a new band and light up the hotel a little more from the outside to attract more visitors.
The floor carpet was so dirty, you can inhale the dust in it. But the room size was okey, the bed and beddings were also good.
Ok to stay for short visit.
Its creepy at night on the hallways. Old run down hotel. Badly need renovations.

The room was backwards, the key works completely backwards you can not understand how to turn a simple light on because they have complicated the sh@t out of it. Very frustrating. The property is run down from a once nice hotel the room lamp shades were deteriorating in front of us, and the large rat at the breakfast buffet made us cancel the rest of the nights there. Would not stay there ever again. The food at the restaurant "spaghetti" was not fit for a dog.
Good breakfast, location but a little bit old
Pros: Location to airport Cons: Dirty Carpet and bathroom
Little bit pricey average buffet for the cost and rooms outdated
Pros- Friendly, attentive and helpful staff Good room Cons- Slightly dated feel Chapagne bar restaurant wasn't great
Free airport-hotel transfer. Great service from concierge crew. So-so breakfast. Housekeeping not so good.

This hotel advertised internet in rooms but nothing, we changed rooms because they said better down a floor but still nothing, had to always go lobby, buffet breakfast was not good not alot to choose fromand food cold, for a 4 star hotel i was very disappointed
Friendly staff, clean surroundings and accessible to public transport
Room is big and clean, friendly staffs and very near to shopping area!
Breakfast buffet, pool area comfortable room
friendly and helpfull staff - clean room -value for money
Close to City, Accesible Transportation, Casino nearby
I like their Free shuttle service, I like their breakfast buffet the food was really good, i like their old interior design
Accessible to shopping malls, friendly and very courteous staff, very clean hotel
Clean well maintained rooks, Great food,
1) location for airport - 2) comfort in room - 3) clean
outstanding staff great pool excellent food
large room, friendly staff, good food
great buffet breakfast, fast room service, warm staff
Location, putting it close to the airport and SM Lanang Mall, and wifi access
Nice pool, good service, friendly and hospitable staff.
Spacious, quiet and easy acces to the airport. Just a slight improvement on service will make it better.
clean room, friendly staff, easy access
easy access to public transportation, very near the malls, and nice gym
its very near the airport, they have free shuttle to/from airport, staff are very accommodating
Hotel is just near the airport, provides everything you need whole away from home
clean rooms and good breakfast every morning
new SM near to the hotel. also some laundry, aisa massage shops (even in the hotel,but more expenisve).
Quiet area, helpful staff and good service.
Near the malls and very accessible to public transportation
The rooms are fantastic, above expectation
Near the mall and other interests in the city. Casino!!!
Good Location, Friendly and Helpful Staff, Spacious Rooms
It is near SM Lanang and Samal Island
Good price for what u get
Quiet location, Close enough to malls, Clean and quiet rooms
Home away from home all amenities great within the hotel
Location not far from the Airport
Warm and helpful staff. Very good wi-fi. Clean room.
Near new shopping malls like Abreeza Mall and SM Mall Lanang. Good to have casino inside the hotel.
Good location; spacious rooms; friendly staff; good breakfast buffet
it is very near to the top tourist spot in Davao, and a very friendly and accomodating staff
Great breakfast, clean and tidy, good, friendly, efficient staff.
Casino on site, old, but recently upgraded room ammenities, good breakfast buffet for Davao standard, taxi stand at the hotel always full during the visit
Hotel personnel are very friendly and accomodating. Food is really good just like how it's being served at home.
I liked the location and freeairport transfer.
very well firnished, decorated and comfortable
Good and neat Housekeeping services and food
The best part of the Grand Regal is the breakfast buffet
spacious, free buffet breakfast & airport-hotel transfer service
Spacious, relatively cheaper, good parking area, quite elegant
Rooms comfortable, great breakfast, elegant decor
Lanang. Close to airport, shopping, Samal Ferry. Away from city.
i like the reception area they are acommodating
Hotel has good facilities for conference
People are very pleasant, room is very clean.
Location is proximate to the airport
gym, sauna,swimming pool, cleanest rooms ever
the breakfast buffet menu has good variety .
service is good/staff is very friendly
Friendly and helpful hotel staff, breakfast was great and comfortable room and bed.
Nette kamer, zeer goed ontbijt en lokaal dichtbij mall.
Kort bij luchthaven,vlabij SM mall,behulpzaam personeel
お勧めです。また滞在したいです。
ロケーションは中心街から離れているが、分かりやすい位置であるし、綺麗な海の島や空港へは便利です。 スタッフはフレンドリー、設備もそれなりで、言うことはない。 ただし、ドリアンはともかく、マンゴウもロビーで入場を断られた。
スタッフはフレンドリー、部屋も広い、朝食はまあまあであるが夕食はタクシーで50B位の所に沢山ある。空港とのシャトルバスは利用すべきだ。
シャワーの水はゴミが出るし排水が詰まり水浸しになる。食事もこれが4STARTかと思います。歯ブラシが無くコンビニで買いました。全体的に古過ぎて手直しが必要なホテルです。
カジノ利用目的でよく利用します。 ダバオにはもっと安くもっと綺麗なホテルがありますが、夜中カジノ終わりでタクシーに乗るのは面倒ですから、泊まっています。 一番残念なのは、歯ブラシが設置されていません。シャンプーとボディソープ、石鹸は、簡単なものがあります。フロント奥の誰もいない売店で買えますが、歯磨き粉も別途買う必要があります。 観光やビジネスなら、他のホテルをおすすめします。
朝食はフルーツが多種ありよかった
綺麗、カジノ併設、空港に近い。
カジノがある。あとはない。
フロントの対応は良いです。ハウスーキーパーも礼儀正しい。レストランのウェーター・ウェートレスも愛想が良かった。
常にシャワーのお湯が温かくて良かった。
中心部から離れているので治安が良い。部屋が広く快適。プールが楽しかった。
清潔感、フロントの対応、朝食
空港に近い、カジノ、スタッフがいい
バスタブが有り・プールも完備・しかもSMラナンに誓い
場所が良い、朝食ビュッフェが良い、適切な広さ
バー　カジノ　空港近く
バスタブがあること。カジノが併設されていること。安いこと。
スタッフの対応が良い。朝食が楽しい。部屋が広くてゆったりしている。
スタッフがフレンドリー

従業員は皆愛想もあり親切です。

Flera kackerlackor i rummet är riktigt äckligt. I frukosten är nästan all mat kall. Ingen värme på. Han som jobbade i gymmet/poolen var inte trevlig alls. Vi fick byta rum efter en natt pga nå problem med vattnet. Fick ett betydligt sämre rum. Nästan ingen internet täckning alls.
건물 낡고 5층은 소음이 심함 515호 텔레비젼 유선방송 안나와서 바꾸고 화장실은 버그있고 개수대에는 막는거 없고 욕실바닥 물안빠지고 소음 심하다니까 방바꿔주고 809호 809호는 텔레비젼 액정나가서 바꾸고 금고는 배터리나가서 갈고 이 호텔은 위치 빼고는 최악입니다
Highly recommended to all my family and friends.
来回机场比较方便（可以避开堵车）
价格适宜、房间空间宽大
来回机场比较方便（可以避开堵车）
오래된 호텔이라 공사하는 부분이 많았습니다, 밤에 공조기 돌아가는 소음이 있었습니다. 그러나 직원들이 매우친절 했습니다. 데스크에 근무하는안내직원들의 인상과 인사. 안내멘트 너무나 인상적이였습니다. 또한 아침 식사 식당에 근무하는 직원 모두 친절했습니다. 직원들 친절에 감동받았습니다.

오랜된호텔 옷장은 살짝 냄새남. 와이파이 대체적으로 잘안됨. (5층,9층) 조식 아주 나쁘지는 않음. 늦은 체크아웃 시간당 400페소. 빨래 개당 50~150페소. 벨보이 옆에 공항 무료 셔틀 시간 확인하고 예약하면 무료이용가능. 팁만 주면 됨. 첫날 온수 안나옴(이후 간헐적 온수 공급). 엘리베이터. 10일 숙박중 9일 동안 점검(2개중1개) 룸키 잦은 고장(재등록 수회) 다음엔 안감..
카지노사 있어서 심심하진 않고 가까운 거리에 나낭 sm이 있어서 구경삼아 한번 다녀옴. 택시타는데 부담이 없고 나름 괜찮음. 공항에서 무료 픽업 써비스가 있음
아! 정말 다시 가고 싶다. 다바오 정말 큰 도시다 세부나 바콜로드에 비해서 시간이 된다면 다시 한 번 가고 싶고 다시 간다면 그랜드리갈 호텔에 묵고 싶다. 항시 대기중인 택시, 24시간 영업하는 카지노, 가까이에 위치한 한인식당 정가네와 사계 그리고 마사지샵 K1, 타이보란 등 정말 가성비 좋은 호텔이다.
호텔 위치가 공항 근처이고 다운타운과 가까이에 위치하여 편리하고 가격대비 괞찬은 편이다.
Kaldt svømmebasseng. Engelsk frokost 1 av 5 dager. Synes det er for dårlig på et 4 stjerner hotell. Elendig wifi
5층, 6층 사용 하였는데 24시간 기계 돌아가는 소리 나서 밤에는 짜증남니다. 어떤날은 타올도 교체 하지도 않고 모닝콜 신청 했는데 아침에 벨도 안울림공항 픽업 샌딩 무료 해줌니다. 소음 감수 하고 가십시요.
교통이 어느정도 편리하고, 대부분 조용한 주변과 조금은 안전환 환경입니다. 호텔 내부는 좀 낡았습니다.
Location was near a Mall...but really not a road you can walk to anyplaces
Always here, dont like other hotel.
Always good to be back here.
Huge rooms, Friendly and Accommodating Staff but Overall the some Hotel fixtures and facilities require renovation and improvements.
It's a basic hotel, fairly clean, and staffed with friendly people. Transportation was supposedly provided but didn't show up as agreed. I had to take the cab to get there.
For many years we hold our Franchise Seminars in that Hotel with great success and great service by Hotel Staff.
Very nice hotel excellent location friendly atmoshere ,clean ,breakfast buffet impressive with options ,very clean ,smoking atea in yard over all very nice

Worst hotel experience ever. We waited over an hour for our 1 single order (spag) and everytime we follow up, the waiter will just say 5mins more maam, only to find out it wasn't even prepared yet. I ended up hungry and angry, no food, and no choice just to cancel the order.I will never go to grand regal again.

There was no wifi network in the room though it was mentioned in Agoda.com website. I lost valuable time due lack of network communication. Though furnitures are old, they were enough for temporary storage of guests belongings. The room was of good size with a king size bed for relaxing sleep. The bathroom faucet and shower head should be more clean and shiny to be appropriate for a hotel. The front desk staff was friendly, airport transfer service included in room rate was helpful. We thank the manager for arranging to provide us early breakfast at 3 a.m., because we were fasting for Ramadan. We appreciate your respect for our faith. Overall, we had a good stay at Grand Regal Hotel in Davao.
The service is not but location and facilities of the hotel is not the best that you could get in Davao.

I found the Grand Regal Hotel a fantastic place. Its full of Davao charm and the staff are fantastic. I was initially startled by the carpeted floors but hey, it goes with the place, the rooms are spacious and the price is average and affordable. The hotel is located abot 7 Klm from. I found the Grand Regal Hotel a great place, good security with internet in rooms and of course the whole of the lobby area is free wifi also. My recommendation is to go there and enjoy the hotel.

We stay there for 5 days the staff in the restaurant was very kind and serve us and they are smiling..they are very nice...but in the information little bit dissapointed because i ask for wifi password and i didnt hear clear he is little angry... And room wifi was slow
The warmth and caring attitude of the staff - very attentive to any help needed. The staff in champagne bar in evenings - especially Friday and Saturday night with the fantastic Stagelights Band!
Great location near Samal, not that far from the city too
The hotel staff and the wonderful "Stagelights Band" in the champagne bar who will play your favorife songs and play them so well with a smile. Highly recommended!!
Location great. Staff extremely well mannered. All amenities were fabulous. Plus Breaky was delicious 👍🏽😊
